subject: Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Olympic Games (2014)
Ski Jumping
Women and Girls
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: A long fight for inclusion, including a failed lawsuit in 2010, ends in a victory and a place in the Sochi Games in 2014.
snippet: A long fight for inclusion, including a failed lawsuit in 2010, ends in a victory and a place in the Sochi Games in 2014.
